scripts.build:docs: typedoc --out docs --target es6 --theme minimal --mode file src
scripts.test:prod: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage --no-cache
scripts.release: npm run build && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true npm publish
scripts.release:nightly: npm run build && npm version prerelease --no-git-tag-version && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.release:dev: npm run build && npm version prerelease --no-git-tag-version && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true npm publish --tag dev
